divs: Sighting DetailsWas sitting at work and talking on phone when I noticed a small silver sphere floating over the ocean about a kilometer out to sea. I watched it for over an hour and a half before it moved further out to sea so quickly that I then knew it was not a Man made aircraft or balloon. I cannot explain the speed which it moved at. It almost seemed as though it "dissapeared".
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Durban
There were no other sightings in Durban on or around February 10th 1995
